contentStep2.stepText: Schedule a convenient in-person evaluation at our office or your location

contentStep3.stepText: Receive immediate payment through your preferred method: cash, digital transfer, or check

list.title: We purchase electronics in any condition
Specializing in challenging cases (devices requiring repair, water damage, factory defects, non-functional units, physical damage)
All processing and shipping costs covered
We guarantee fully legal and transparent transactions

feedback.content: Just unloaded my 65" Samsung QLED that was collecting dust after the upgrade. These guys in Miami made it painless - quoted me right over the phone, showed up on time, paid what they promised. Even helped disconnect it from the wall mount. Solid service, would definitely recommend!
feedback.name: Michael R.

feedback.content: Got rid of my old side-by-side Frigidaire yesterday. Was worried about moving that beast, but their team handled everything. Price was fair, though a bit less than I hoped for. Still, can't beat the convenience. Quick, professional - in and out in 20 minutes. Would've given 5 stars if the price was a bit higher.
feedback.name: Sarah M.

feedback.content: Had an EGO electric mower taking up space in my garage since moving to a condo. These folks were a lifesaver! Easy scheduling, showed up when they said they would, and paid in cash on the spot. Even took the charger and batteries. Whole process took maybe 15 minutes tops. Definitely the way to go if you need to sell electronics quickly!
feedback.name: David K.

listAsq.title: Is my personal data safe?
listAsq.content: Do you help with data removal? Every device undergoes complete data erasure and factory reset at no cost, ensuring your privacy and security.

listAsq.title: Do you purchase non-working, damaged, water-damaged, or older generation devices?
listAsq.content: Yes, we evaluate each device individually, regardless of condition. Many damaged or non-working electronics still hold value. Contact us for a quick online assessment – we'll provide a fair quote without wasting your time.

listAsq.title: What can I do to maximize the value of my electronics?
listAsq.content:
To ensure the best possible value for your electronics:
  • Clean your device thoroughly – dust-free devices allow for accurate condition assessment

  • Remove any stickers or modifications – maintain original appearance

  • Include original packaging and documentation – these significantly increase value

  • Provide all available accessories – chargers, cables, and peripherals enhance the overall package value

listAsq.title: Can I get a price estimate by sending photos of my device?
listAsq.content: Visit our Online Evaluation section and choose your preferred communication method: phone, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Telegram, Instagram, or email. For accurate pricing, please include detailed specifications and clear photos from multiple angles. Note: Please disclose any existing damage to ensure price consistency during physical inspection.

listAsq.title: How quickly will I receive payment after selling my device?
listAsq.content: Cash payment available instantly. We offer multiple payment options: PayPal, Venmo, Cash App, Google Pay, Zelle, check, or bank transfer. In-person transactions receive immediate payment, whether at our office or during pickup. For mailed devices, payment is processed the same day we receive your device.

listAsq.title: Is same-day pickup available for my electronics?
listAsq.content: Yes, we offer same-day pickup service throughout Florida. For valuable items, we can arrange pickup even during extended hours to accommodate your schedule.

listAsq.title: Do you accept device by mail, and who covers the shipping costs?
listAsq.content: We handle all shipping logistics and costs, including full insurance coverage for your device. Our secure shipping process ensures safe delivery, and payment is processed the same day we receive your device.
